post.body: LOL... my Mom did that once... it was a serious 'I love lucy' moment ;)
Heheh... and what a good time it was! :)
It would be pretty amazing to hook up while we're both there!
Are you kidding me? We're in Venice from June 30th-3rd officially, but we're trying to decide if we want to stay longer. :)
Apparently the update for LR with mkII support will be coming out any day now :)
Hopefully see you there! :)
I was told I *might* get my mine on tuesday or wednesday... I can hardly stand the suspense!
Did you get the direct message I sent you yesterday?
Hugs? :)
The possibilities are amazing enough to make me want to conquer the skill. Never imagined video ability would capture me like that!
I imagine it wouldn't be... especially with the tilt shift! :P
I hadn't really thought about using the video on my mkII when I get it... but I'd be lying if I said that didn't get me excited! :)
Yeah, it's pretty frustrating... thanks for the empathy! :)
Ahhh... that's exactly what I thought of when I woke up this morning! Great minds I tell you ;)
It's the sweater curse.... I still have one from last christmas that needs to be finished! :P
Plus, I have a wedding in the snow on Tuesday, so I thought it would be good not to have frozen toes while shooting! ;)
Ones that are actually meant for the snow and keep your feet warm. It barely snows in Van, so I've never needed them before!
My husband and I just went in on a wii together... you're going to love it! :)
I'll see you there! :)
... but two forks, now we're talking! ;)
I think I might pop with excitement!! :D
Anybody out there in the twitterverse planning on attending wppi in Feb? Wondering who I'll meet in real life! :)
Dreamt I was in Venice last night, and it was flooding profusely... hope that doesn't happen for real when I'm there in June! :P
Hello world... you're awfully snowy today! :)
Finishing up some business and waiting for friends to arrive... festive awesomeness night soon to commence!
Plans for an awesome night: dinner with good friends, mulled wine to drink, a trip to the festival of lights and bake some christmas cookies
Led Zepplin... awesome! The perfect music to blow out those last couple shots... thanks itunes!
Just spoke with my camera store... looks like I may be feeling better about them in a few days time!
soup for lunch + snowy snowy day = bliss
Other then some gear prep for tomorrow's wedding, I plan to do absolutely nothing today! :)
Hooray for snow! :)
Finally have a pair of proper winter boots... feeling like a real Canadian right now! :)
About to make huevos rancheros... yum!
*finally* found a local retailer selling mkII batteries... was a little worried for a moment there! :P
The tree is all lit up, I have a cup of coffee in hand and a window out on a snowy landscape... good times. :)
I am a happy happy girl right now :)
OMG... going to go pick up my mkII today!!!
Enjoying the notion I have nothing pressing to do today... :D
I just joined the wedchat Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/wedchat and you can too
Alright twitterverse...I'm heading out all day and will have no access to my internet life. I know this is going to be weird for both of us!
